description.value:
Your association with shadow magic grants you access to certain spells. Starting at 1st level when you choose this origin, and again at 3rd, 5th, 7th, and 9th level, you learn the spells listed for that level in the Shadow Magic Spells table. The spells count as sorcerer spells for you, but don't count against the number of sorcerer spells you know.

Shadow Magic Spells

Sorcerer Level Spells
1st @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.02YWG7SFYVQ2T31P]{Arms of Hadar}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.A3q2gTNqG6fvNGrv]{Disguise Self}
3rd @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.S7VbUetIfVT7B6Eq]{Darkness}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.6UYMI5U6F1FHSGBH]{Pass Without Trace}
5th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.pO4zGe5LmFIYqJiL]{Bestow Curse}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.XXUDGFELgoskdOD0]{Fear}
7th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.tEpDmYZNGc9f5OhJ]{Greater Invisibility}, shadows of moil
9th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.MVY8DECHHNH20BKU]{Enervation}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.MBMaQLwoy05qzMJ3]{Mislead}
